ComicInfo.Summary: The Mirror War [Part 3]: The Enterprise crew learns that the Klingons have placed a bounty on their heads, so they devise a plan to sabotage a Cardassian listening post so they can move through Klingon-Cardassian space undetected.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 21:30:35. [CVDB902074] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:00:33. [Issue ID 2296435]
